faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I change my plan later?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.q2: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
faq.a2: Yes! Our Traveler plan comes with a 3-day free trial so you can experience all its features before committing. Start exploring with our affordable Traveler plan at just $4.99 after your trial. You can upgrade anytime if you need more advanced capabilities for your travels.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards forsubscriptions.
